ygData.subject: Re: My Faction and the Sacrilege Plague
ygData.msgSnippet: Lady Right, Lobstruck, and Lepord all watch this fight go on.  The shots that Void ducked all hit Lady Right in the shoulder.  She fell backwards then got back

Lady Right, Lobstruck, and Lepord all watch this fight go on.  The 
shots that Void ducked all hit Lady Right in the shoulder.  She fell 
backwards then got back up on her feet.

   "Hey Void, is that cloud of your combutibal(SP?)?"  Lepord yells.

   "Obviously Not, cause Thirst just shot some shots."  Lobsturck 
says.

   With those words Lobstruck fires 4 Eye Lasers.  Once seeing 
Lobsturck fire the two other preds fire.  Lady Right fires 25 bullets 
from her arms and fires 4 Eye Lasers and Lepord fires 4 shots from 
his gut gun and fires 4 eye lasers. 


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> OOC: Dewboy from your earlier post Thirst was a short distance from 
void. 
> There is no way he would be PBR at the moment. And as for the acid 
it is 
> covering his entire body. If he ejected his armor he'd be screwed 
anyway 
> because the acid in the cloud would just cling to his now exposed 
super 
> structure which noone can eject because it is the body itself. And 
as for the 
> flames sticking to void, even if they did it would have been put 
out 
> immediately by his body. Thank you dewboy for screwing your 
charachter over.
> 
> IC:
> 
> As the four not so point blank range plasma blasts fly out at Void, 
he 
> quickly ducks to avoid them. At the same time the acidic cloud once 
again 
> expels a red acidic ooze all over thirst now eating away at his 
very 
> structure.
